web.domains.learn_more_dns.translation: Ako atu anō mō te whirihoranga DNS

web.domains.domain_already_in_organizati.en: This domain is already registered in your organization
web.domains.domain_already_in_organizati.translation: Kei roto kē tēnei rohe i tō whakahaere

web.domains.domain_in_other_organization.en: This domain is already registered to another organization. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
web.domains.domain_in_other_organization.translation: Kei roto kē tēnei rohe i tētahi atu whakahaere. Tēnā whakapā ki te tautoko mēnā e whakapono ana koe he hapa tēnei.

web.domains.domain_claimed_successfully.en: Domain successfully claimed and added to your organization
web.domains.domain_claimed_successfully.translation: Kua angituhia te tiki i te rohe me te tāpiri ki tō whakahaere

web.domains.privacy_defaults_description.en: Set default privacy options for secrets created under this domain. These settings will be pre-filled when creating new secrets.
web.domains.privacy_defaults_description.translation: Whakatau ngā kōwhiringa matatapu taunoa mō ngā karere huna i waihangahia i raro i tēnei rohe. Ka whakakīia wawe ēnei tautuhinga ina waihanga karere huna hou.

web.domains.default_ttl_hint.en: How long secrets should remain accessible by default
web.domains.default_ttl_hint.translation: Pēhea te roa e wātea ai ngā karere huna i te taunoa

web.domains.passphrase_required_hint.en: Make passphrase mandatory for all secrets in this domain
web.domains.passphrase_required_hint.translation: Whakaritea kia here te kupu karapa mō ngā karere huna katoa i tēnei rohe

web.domains.notify_enabled_hint.en: Enable email notifications by default when secrets are viewed
web.domains.notify_enabled_hint.translation: Whakahohea ngā whakamōhio īmēra i te taunoa ina tirohia ngā karere huna

web.domains.switcher_locked.en: Domain switching not available on this page
web.domains.switcher_locked.translation: Kāore te whakawhiti rohe i tēnei whārangi

web.domains.canonical_no_settings.en: Default domain has no settings page
web.domains.canonical_no_settings.translation: Kāore he whārangi tautuhinga mō te rohe taunoa

web.domains.control_whether_users_can_cr.en: Control whether users can create secret links from your domain's homepage
web.domains.control_whether_users_can_cr.translation: Whakahaere mehemea ka taea e ngā kaiwhakamahi te waihanga i ngā hononga karere huna mai i te whārangi matua o tō rohe

web.domains.manage_and_configure_your_ve.en: Manage and configure your verified custom domains
web.domains.manage_and_configure_your_ve.translation: Whakahaere me te whirihoranga i ō rohe ritenga manatokohia

web.domains.open_domain_in_new_tab.translation: Huaki rohe i tētahi ripa hou

web.domains.get_started_by_adding_a_cust.en: Get started by adding a custom domain.
web.domains.get_started_by_adding_a_cust.translation: Tīmatahia mā te tāpiri i tētahi rohe ritenga.

web.domains.in_order_to_connect_your_dom.en: In order to connect your domain, you'll need to have a CNAME record in your DNS that points
web.domains.in_order_to_connect_your_dom.translation: Ki te tūhono i tō rohe, me whai he tuhinga CNAME i roto i tō DNS e tohu ana

web.domains.if_you_already_have_a_cname_.en: If you already have a CNAME record for that address, please change it to point at
web.domains.if_you_already_have_a_cname_.translation: Mēnā kua whai kē koe i tētahi tuhinga CNAME mō taua wāhitau, tēnā hurihia kia tohu ki

web.domains.a_cname_record_is_not_allowe.en: ), a CNAME record is not allowed. Instead, you'll need to create an A record. Details on how to do this are provided further down the page.
web.domains.a_cname_record_is_not_allowe.translation: ), kāore e whakaaetia tētahi tuhinga CNAME. Engari, me waihanga koe i tētahi tuhinga A. Ka whakaratohia ngā taipitopito mo te pēhea te mahi i tēnei ki raro iho o te whārangi.

web.domains.and_remove_any_other_a_aaaa_.en: and remove any other A, AAAA, or CNAME records for that exact address.
web.domains.and_remove_any_other_a_aaaa_.translation: ā, tangohia ētahi atu tuhinga A, AAAA, CNAME rānei mō taua wāhitau tonu.

web.domains.youll_need_to_complete_these.en: , you'll need to complete these steps.
web.domains.youll_need_to_complete_these.translation: , me whakaoti e koe ēnei mahi.

web.domains.before_we_can_activate_links.en: Before we can activate links for
web.domains.before_we_can_activate_links.translation: I mua i tā mātou whakahohe i ngā hononga mō

web.domains.please_note_that_for_apex_do.en: Please note that for apex domains (e.g.,
web.domains.please_note_that_for_apex_do.translation: Tēnā kia mōhio mō ngā rohe tihi (hei tauira,

web.domains.it_may_take_a_few_minutes_fo.en: It may take a few minutes for your SSL certificate to take effect.
web.domains.it_may_take_a_few_minutes_fo.translation: Ka pau pea ētahi meneti mō tō tiwhikete SSL kia whai pānga.

web.domains.dns_changes_can_take_as_litt.en: DNS changes can take as little as 60 seconds -- or up to 24 hours -- to take effect.
web.domains.dns_changes_can_take_as_litt.translation: Ka taea e ngā whakarerekētanga DNS kia iti ake i te 60 hēkona -- tae atu rānei ki te 24 haora -- kia whai pānga.

web.domains.add_this_hostname_to_your_dn.en: Add this hostname to your DNS configuration:
web.domains.add_this_hostname_to_your_dn.translation: Tāpirihia tēnei ingoa kaihautū ki tō whirihoranga DNS:

web.domains.follow_these_steps_to_verify.en: Follow these steps to verify domain ownership and elevate your online presence:
web.domains.follow_these_steps_to_verify.translation: Whāia ēnei mahi hei whakaū i te rangatiratanga rohe me te whakapiki i tō noho ipurangi:

web.domains.domain_verification_initiate.translation: I tīmatahia angitutia te whakaū rohe.

web.domains.are_you_sure_you_want_to_rem.en: Are you sure you want to remove this domain? This action cannot be undone.
web.domains.are_you_sure_you_want_to_rem.translation: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te tango i tēnei rohe? Kāore e taea te whakakore tēnei mahi.

web.domains.failed_to_add_domain.translation: I rahua te tāpiri i te rohe
